00048 #ifndef __CVMX_QLM_H__
00049 #define __CVMX_QLM_H__
00050 
00051 #include "cvmx.h"
00052 
00053 /*
00054  * Interface 0 on the 78xx can be connected to qlm 0 or qlm 2. When interface
00055  * 0 is connected to qlm 0, this macro must be set to 0. When interface 0 is
00056  * connected to qlm 2, this macro must be set to 1.
00057  */
00058 #define MUX_78XX_IFACE0     0
00059 
00060 /*
00061  * Interface 1 on the 78xx can be connected to qlm 1 or qlm 3. When interface
00062  * 1 is connected to qlm 1, this macro must be set to 0. When interface 1 is
00063  * connected to qlm 3, this macro must be set to 1.
00064  */
00065 #define MUX_78XX_IFACE1     0
00066 
00067 /* Uncomment this line to print QLM JTAG state */
00068 /* #define CVMX_QLM_DUMP_STATE 1 */

00070 typedef struct {
00071     const char *name;
00072     int stop_bit;
00073     int start_bit;
00074 } __cvmx_qlm_jtag_field_t;

00081 extern int cvmx_qlm_get_num(void);

00083 /**
00084  * Return the qlm number based on the interface
00085  *
00086  * @param xiface  Interface to look
00087  */
00088 extern int cvmx_qlm_interface(int xiface);
00089 
00090 /**
00091  * Return the qlm number based for a port in the interface
00092  *
00093  * @param xiface  interface to look up
00094  * @param index  index in an interface
00095  *
00096  * @return the qlm number based on the xiface
00097  */
00098 extern int cvmx_qlm_lmac(int xiface, int index);

00100 /**
00101  * Return if only DLM5/DLM6/DLM5+DLM6 is used by BGX
00102  *
00103  * @param BGX  BGX to search for.
00104  *
00105  * @return muxes used 0 = DLM5+DLM6, 1 = DLM5, 2 = DLM6.
00106  */
00107 extern int cvmx_qlm_mux_interface(int bgx);

00116 extern int cvmx_qlm_get_lanes(int qlm);

00138 /**

00140  *

00142  * @param lane   Lane in QLM to get
00143  * @param name   String name of field
00144  *

00149 /**
00150  * Set a field in a QLM JTAG chain
00151  *
00152  * @param qlm    QLM to set
00153  * @param lane   Lane in QLM to set, or -1 for all lanes
00154  * @param name   String name of field
00155  * @param value  Value of the field
00156  */
00157 extern void cvmx_qlm_jtag_set(int qlm, int lane, const char *name,
00158                   uint64_t value);

00160 /**
00161  * Errata G-16094: QLM Gen2 Equalizer Default Setting Change.
00162  * CN68XX pass 1.x and CN66XX pass 1.x QLM tweak. This function tweaks the
00163  * JTAG setting for a QLMs to run better at 5 and 6.25Ghz.
00164  */
00165 extern void __cvmx_qlm_speed_tweak(void);
00166 
00167 /**
00168  * Errata G-16174: QLM Gen2 PCIe IDLE DAC change.
00169  * CN68XX pass 1.x, CN66XX pass 1.x and CN63XX pass 1.0-2.2 QLM tweak.
00170  * This function tweaks the JTAG setting for a QLMs for PCIe to run better.
00171  */
00172 extern void __cvmx_qlm_pcie_idle_dac_tweak(void);
00173 
00174 extern void __cvmx_qlm_pcie_cfg_rxd_set_tweak(int qlm, int lane);
00175 
00176 /**
00177  * Get the speed (Gbaud) of the QLM in Mhz.
00178  *
00179  * @param qlm    QLM to examine
00180  *
00181  * @return Speed in Mhz
00182  */
00183 extern int cvmx_qlm_get_gbaud_mhz(int qlm);
00184 /**
00185  * Get the speed (Gbaud) of the QLM in Mhz on specific node.
00186  *
00187  * @param node   Target QLM node
00188  * @param qlm    QLM to examine
00189  *
00190  * @return Speed in Mhz
00191  */
00192 extern int cvmx_qlm_get_gbaud_mhz_node(int node, int qlm);

00194 enum cvmx_qlm_mode {
00195     CVMX_QLM_MODE_DISABLED = -1,
00196     CVMX_QLM_MODE_SGMII = 1,
00197     CVMX_QLM_MODE_XAUI,
00198     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RXAUI,
00199     CVMX_QLM_MODE_PCIE, /* gen3 / gen2 / gen1 */
00200     CVMX_QLM_MODE_PCIE_1X2, /* 1x2 gen2 / gen1 */
00201     CVMX_QLM_MODE_PCIE_2X1, /* 2x1 gen2 / gen1 */
00202     CVMX_QLM_MODE_PCIE_1X1, /* 1x1 gen2 / gen1 */
00203     CVMX_QLM_MODE_SRIO_1X4, /* 1x4 short / long */
00204     CVMX_QLM_MODE_SRIO_2X2, /* 2x2 short / long */
00205     CVMX_QLM_MODE_SRIO_4X1, /* 4x1 short / long */
00206     CVMX_QLM_MODE_ILK,
00207     CVMX_QLM_MODE_QSGMII,
00208     CVMX_QLM_MODE_SGMII_SGMII,
00209     CVMX_QLM_MODE_SGMII_DISABLED,
00210     CVMX_QLM_MODE_DISABLED_SGMII,
00211     CVMX_QLM_MODE_SGMII_QSGMII,
00212     CVMX_QLM_MODE_QSGMII_QSGMII,
00213     CVMX_QLM_MODE_QSGMII_DISABLED,
00214     CVMX_QLM_MODE_DISABLED_QSGMII,
00215     CVMX_QLM_MODE_QSGMII_SGMII,
00216     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RXAUI_1X2,
00217     CVMX_QLM_MODE_SATA_2X1,
00218     CVMX_QLM_MODE_XLAUI,
00219     CVMX_QLM_MODE_XFI,
00220     CVMX_QLM_MODE_10G_KR,
00221     CVMX_QLM_MODE_40G_KR4,
00222     CVMX_QLM_MODE_PCIE_1X8,  /* 1x8 gen3 / gen2 / gen1 */
00223     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RGMII_SGMII,
00224     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RGMII_XFI,
00225     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RGMII_10G_KR,
00226     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RGMII_RXAUI,
00227     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RGMII_XAUI,
00228     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RGMII_XLAUI,
00229     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RGMII_40G_KR4,
00230     CVMX_QLM_MODE_MIXED,      /* BGX2 is mixed mode, DLM5(SGMII) & DLM6(XFI) */
00231     CVMX_QLM_MODE_SGMII_2X1,  /* Configure BGX2 separate for DLM5 & DLM6 */ 
00232     CVMX_QLM_MODE_10G_KR_1X2, /* Configure BGX2 separate for DLM5 & DLM6 */
00233     CVMX_QLM_MODE_XFI_1X2,    /* Configure BGX2 separate for DLM5 & DLM6 */
00234     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RGMII_SGMII_1X1, /* Configure BGX2, applies to DLM5 */
00235     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RGMII_SGMII_2X1, /* Configure BGX2, applies to DLM6 */
00236     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RGMII_10G_KR_1X1, /* Configure BGX2, applies to DLM6 */
00237     CVMX_QLM_MODE_RGMII_XFI_1X1, /* Configure BGX2, applies to DLM6 */
00238     CVMX_QLM_MODE_SDL,    /* RMAC Pipe */
00239     CVMX_QLM_MODE_CPRI,   /* RMAC */
00240     CVMX_QLM_MODE_OCI
00241 };
00242 
00243 enum cvmx_gmx_inf_mode {
00244     CVMX_GMX_INF_MODE_DISABLED = 0,
00245     CVMX_GMX_INF_MODE_SGMII = 1,     /* Other interface can be SGMII or QSGMII */
00246     CVMX_GMX_INF_MODE_QSGMII = 2,    /* Other interface can be SGMII or QSGMII */
00247     CVMX_GMX_INF_MODE_RXAUI = 3,     /* Only interface 0, interface 1 must be DISABLED */
00248 };
00249 
00250 /**
00251  * Eye diagram captures are stored in the following structure
00252  */
00253 typedef struct
00254 {
00255     int width;              /* Width in the x direction (time) */
00256     int height;             /* Height in the y direction (voltage) */
00257     uint32_t data[64][128]; /* Error count at location, saturates as max */
00258 } cvmx_qlm_eye_t;
00259 
00260 /**
00261  * These apply to DLM1 and DLM2 if its not in SATA mode
00262  * Manual refers to lanes as follows:
00263  *  DML 0 lane 0 == GSER0 lane 0
00264  *  DML 0 lane 1 == GSER0 lane 1
00265  *  DML 1 lane 2 == GSER1 lane 0
00266  *  DML 1 lane 3 == GSER1 lane 1
00267  *  DML 2 lane 4 == GSER2 lane 0
00268  *  DML 2 lane 5 == GSER2 lane 1
00269  */
00270 enum cvmx_pemx_cfg_mode {
00271     CVMX_PEM_MD_GEN2_2LANE = 0, /* Valid for PEM0(DLM1), PEM1(DLM2) */
00272     CVMX_PEM_MD_GEN2_1LANE = 1, /* Valid for PEM0(DLM1.0), PEM1(DLM1.1,DLM2.0), PEM2(DLM2.1) */
00273     CVMX_PEM_MD_GEN2_4LANE = 2, /* Valid for PEM0(DLM1-2) */
00274     /* Reserved */
00275     CVMX_PEM_MD_GEN1_2LANE = 4, /* Valid for PEM0(DLM1), PEM1(DLM2) */
00276     CVMX_PEM_MD_GEN1_1LANE = 5, /* Valid for PEM0(DLM1.0), PEM1(DLM1.1,DLM2.0), PEM2(DLM2.1) */
00277     CVMX_PEM_MD_GEN1_4LANE = 6, /* Valid for PEM0(DLM1-2) */
00278     /* Reserved */
00279 };
00280

00294  * Measure the reference clock of a QLM on a multi-node setup
00295  *
00296  * @param node   node to measure
00297  * @param qlm    QLM to measure

00299  * @return Clock rate in Hz

00303 /*
00304  * Perform RX equalization on a QLM
00305  *
00306  * @param node  Node the QLM is on
00307  * @param qlm   QLM to perform RX equalization on
00308  * @param lane  Lane to use, or -1 for all lanes
00309  *
00310  * @return Zero on sucess, negative if any lane failed RX equalization
00311  */
00312 extern int __cvmx_qlm_rx_equalization(int node, int qlm, int lane);

00314 /**
00315  * Errata GSER-27882 -GSER 10GBASE-KR Transmit Equalizer
00316  * Training may not update PHY Tx Taps. This function is not static
00317  * so we can share it with BGX KR
00318  *
00319  * @param node  Node to apply errata workaround
00320  * @param qlm   QLM to apply errata workaround
00321  * @param lane  Lane to apply the errata
00322  */
00323 extern int cvmx_qlm_gser_errata_27882(int node, int qlm, int lane);
